page.title: 04GUIDES
page.content: GUIDES ARE A GROUP OF GIRLS WHO MEET TOGETHER AND PLAY GAMES AND SING SONGS.ONE GAME WE PLAY IS 'FIND THE NUMBERS'.OUR PATROL LEADER HIDES UP TO 10 NUMBERS AND WE HAVE TO FIND THEM.THE WINNER IS THE PERSON WHO COLLECTS THE MOST NUMBERS.WE ARE SPLIT INTO PATROLS NAMED AFTER FLOWERS;WITH A PATROL LEADER FOR EACH.WE HAVE A PACK LEADER AS WELL,SHE IS LEADER OF ALL GUIDES.WE PAY 20p EACH WEEK.IT GOES INTO THE{GUIDE}FUNDS. WE WEAR A{UNIFORM}OF A BLUE SKIRT,BLUE TOP,YELLOW NECKERCHIEF AND LEATHER WOGGLE.THE GUIDES ALSO COLLECT BADGES BY WORKING ON A SUBJECT.THESE ARE CALLED INTEREST BADGES.WHEN YOU FIRST JOIN GUIDES YOU ARE ENROLLED INTO THE PACK.YOU ARE GIVEN A GUIDE TREFOIL BADGE. I AM IN 1ST. CARLTON MINIOTT GUIDE COMPANY.
